                 AbsPart v)
        set n = v, where if v is constant, e.g. 'val', must have a '' pair.

      • nvs

        public Update nvs(ArrayList<Object[]> nvs)
           throws TransException
        set array of [n, v], where if v is constant, e.g. 'val', must have a '' pair. FIXME As Query.col() already parsing sql expression, why not this method do the same to have client feel the same?
        Parameters:
        nvs - the n-v array
        Returns:
        this Update statement
        Throws:
        TransException

      • limit

        public Update limit(String lmtExpr)

        Update Limited Rows.

        • ms sql 2k: update top(lmtExpr) ... see Limiting the rows affected by DELETE, INSERT, or UPDATE
        • mysql: update ... limit N, see Mysql Manual: 13.2.12 UPDATE Syntax
        • sqlite: nothing. see SQL As Understood By SQLite
        • Oracle: There should be no such syntax: Oracle Database SQL Reference - UPDATE
        Parameters:
        lmtExpr -
        Returns:
        this

      • sql

        public String sql(ISemantext sctx)
           throws TransException
        Description copied from class: AbsPart
        Generating SQL after all elements in AST are ready. A context is a semantics context for resolving value references, etc. This method shouldn't been called. Use Statement#commit() to generate SQLs.
        Specified by:
        sql in class Statement<Update>
        Returns:
        sql
        Throws:
        TransException - Something invalid while composing sql.
